Package tutoring.tutor

Class Tutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • tutoring.Person
      • tutoring.Student
        • tutoring.tutor.Tutor
  • public class Tutor
extends Student
    A tutor is the same as a student with a list of tutored student and a resource to tutor
    Author:
    quentin.barlet.etu, simon.bocquet.etu, marine.sandras.etu
